programme.title: The Exchange
programme.desc: The Exchange is like meeting with your friends in a coffee shop and discussing everyday stuff that affects us - relationships, parenting, finance, wellbeing and social justice.

programme.title: Harvest TV Rotorua
programme.desc: Dave and Jill Moore of Harvest Church in Rotorua bring inspirational messages, real-life testimonies, and original Kiwi music.

programme.title: Roots and Reflections
programme.desc: Barry Segal joins us from the land of Israel and discusses topics ranging from Biblical holidays to archaeology in Jerusalem to zoology!

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Experience some of the most inspirational and uplifting hymns in one of the world's longest-running television series from the BBC.

programme.title: The Restoration Road
programme.desc: None of us arrive anywhere by accident. We choose, think, pray, and feel our way to our destination. Our inner GPS guides us to one of two places: destruction or restoration.

programme.title: Shine Worship
programme.desc: Worship Videos

programme.title: Give Me An Answer
programme.desc: Cliffe Knechtle tackles tough questions from college students, ranging from ethics to intelligent design; politics to our perception of reality.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.desc: Worship and a clear Bible message from Dr Charles Stanley.

programme.title: Quick Study
programme.desc: Ron Hembree leads an in-depth study of bible passages to learn what God is saying to us today through the Old and New Testaments.

programme.title: Unlocking the Bible
programme.desc: Why was the Bible written? David Pawson explores scripture and discovers some hidden gems.

programme.title: Hillsong Kids: Cubbyhouse
programme.desc: An entertaining show for the little ones aged between 2 and 6, with songs, fun craft time, bible stories and animated teaching and illustrations.

programme.title: Veggie Tales
programme.desc: Finally, some veggies your kids will love! Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber hit the screen for some crazy fun and adventure.

programme.title: Theo
programme.desc: Theo lives in a quaint English village and, together with his mouse friends Luther and Belfry, investigate the fun side of theology!

programme.title: Impact for Life
